source: You can delete existing notes to make room for more. All of your current custom notes can be viewed from the journal window.
target: 你可以删除已有的记录以为新的记录腾出空间。你当前所有的自定记录均可在日志窗口查看。

source: Custom Notes let you record anything you'd like in the journal.\n\nThey can be just text on its own, or they can be associated with a dungeon floor, one of your items, or a type of potion/scroll/ring.
target: 你可以在日志中记下任何你想记录的东西。\n\n自定义备注可以只是独立的文本，也可以是关联于地牢楼层、背包物品或是药剂/卷轴/戒指类别的文本。

source: Write a title for this custom text note:
target: 为自定义文本备注拟题：

source: Select a floor of the dungeon to associate this note with.
target: 选择要备注的地牢楼层

source: Write a title for this custom note for _floor %d_:
target: 为_第%d层_的自定义备注拟题：
选择要备注的背包物品

source: Write a title for this custom note for the item:\n_%s_
Select a type of item you'd like to associate this note with.
target: 选择要备注的物品类别

source: Are you sure you want to delete this custom note?
target: 你确定要删除这个备注吗？
选择放入快捷栏的物品

source: Reach level 6 to unlock more talents.
target: 升到6级以解锁更多天赋

source: Reach level 12 and use the item from the second boss to unlock more talents.
target: 升到12级并使用第二个Boss的掉落物以解锁更多天赋。

source: Reach level 20 and use the item from the fourth boss to unlock more talents.
target: 升到20级并使用第四个Boss的掉落物以解锁更多天赋。

source: Are you sure you want to spend these talent points randomly?
target: 你确定要随机消耗这些天赋点吗？

source: Press again to search\nPress a tile to examine
target: 再按一遍此按钮以搜索周边；\n点选一个地格以获得其信息。

source:
Shattered Pixel Dungeon is regularly updated with overhauls to existing game content, or entirely new content!

Game balance is also frequently improved in game updates, so that specific items/heroes/enemies aren't too strong or too weak.

Updates also include fixes for bugs and other various stability improvements.
target:
破碎的像素地牢会时常更新以变更既有内容，或是加入新东西！

游戏平衡也会经常得到调整，维持物品、英雄、敌人强度的大致均衡。

更新还包含漏洞修复与各种稳定性提升。
